name: Timelapse Full Flight | Oslo to London Heathrow | SAS Boeing 737-600
description:
A timelapse full flight video with SAS Scandinavian Airlines onboard a Boeing 737-600 operating flight SK805 from Oslo to London Heathrow on 12 September 2015.

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

After a sporty takeoff from Gardermoen's runway 01R, we make a sharp right turn immediately after takeoff.  Our route then takes us along the south coast of Norway, before heading off across the North Sea, turning right off the east coast of the UK to make a beautiful scenic approach across London for Heathrow's runway 27R.  After landing we taxi into Terminal 2.

Video take from seat 22F.

Airline:  SAS Scandinavian Airlines
Flight:  SK805
Aircraft:  Boeing 737-600 LN-RPC
From:  Oslo - Gardermoen (OSL)
To:  London - Heathrow (LHR)
Departure:  13:29
Arrival:  14:28
Flight Time:  01:59
Seat:  22F
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/ZKYbyb

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

✈ ✈

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt

Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
